cast.name: 布兰科·普莱沙 Branko Plesa
拉斯特科·塔迪奇 Rastko Tadic
达尼罗·巴塔·斯托科维奇 Danilo 'Bata' Stojkovic

director.name: 沃伊斯拉夫·拉孔亚茨 Vojislav 'Kokan' Rakonjac

introduction: The guard thwarts the convicts escape. Second escape, which failed becouse the convict has saved a guard from the river, turns their hatred into a deep friendship. The guard helps the convict during his new escape. The convict, obsessed with freedom, runs. The guard gives up in the last moment and kills him, realizing, however, that he has killed himself also.Producer: Avala FilmWriter: Branimir ScepanovicCinematographer: Aleksandar PetkovicProduction design: Miodrag HadzicCountry of origin: Jugoslavija, SrbijaFilm editing: Mihailo IlicDuration: 93 minutesSystem: Standard, black/whitePremiere: 5.7.1969.
